title: Cannot Play League Due to Massive Bug

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Okay i submitted a post about this earlier, but the problem is every single game i try to play. I cannot play a single game of league due to being unable to actually pick or ban a hero so i get insta dodged. Riot Help me!

replies.body: This can happen with a weak or other issue with your connection, which can cause you to de-sync and get left behind.  Go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network and get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
